name: Robo2
description:
Supercomputer Jane has taken control of the robots. The only way to remedy the situation is to reboot their software.

Become one of those who can cope with the task. Tell us about your victory by sending a special message.

Find the most efficient way to download and become one of the best, approaching the absolute record of the game.

Your victory will inspire us to create a multi-player application in which Jane will have to face the challenge of connecting multiple successful players simultaneously in real time.
